titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Zenaida Gutiérrez-Vega Collection of José María Chacón y Calvo
Chacón y Calvo (José María) Zenaida Gutiérrez-Vega Collection of
titlestmt.author: by Leigh Golden and Jennifer Meehan

publicationstmt.publisher: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday January 1, 2019 at 04:07
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid written in English and Spanish.

did.unittitle: Zenaida Gutiérrez-Vega collection of José María Chacón y Calvo

repository.corpname: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

did.abstract: The collection consists of material created by or relating to José María Chacón y Calvo, which was accumulated by Zenaida Gutiérrez-Vega in the course of her research on the life and work of the Cuban-born literary critic and academic. Material includes original and copies of correspondence received by Chacón y Calvo from various Cuban, Spanish, and Latin American poets and writers; original manuscripts, typescripts, photocopies, and clippings of writings by Chacón y Calvo; an annotated typescript of Chacón y Calvo's diaries dating from 1917 to 1918; research files containing manuscripts, notes, letters, and printed material relating to other writers (possibly compiled by either Chacón y Calvo or Gutiérrez-Vega); original and photocopies of photographs of Chacón y Calvo; and other material.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Carlos Ripoll received the collection from Zenaida Gutiérrez-Vega.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
Box 13: (computer disk): Restricted Fragile Material. Reference copies of electronic files are available. Consult Access Services for further information.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The Zenaida Gutiérrez-Vega Collection of José María Chacón y Calvo is the physical property of the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University. Literary rights, including copyright, belong to the authors or their legal heirs and assigns. For further information, consult the appropriate curator.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Zenaida Gutiérrez-Vega Collection of José María Chacón y Calvo. General Collection, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection received a basic level of processing, including some rehousing and minimal organization. Descriptive information is drawn in large part from information supplied with the collection and from an initial survey of the contents. Folder titles appearing in the contents list below are largely based on those provided by the creator or previous custodian. Titles have not been verified against the contents of the folders in all cases. Otherwise, folder titles are supplied by staff during initial processing.
This finding aid may be updated periodically to account for new acquisitions to the collection and/or revisions in arrangement and description.

bioghist.head: Jose Maria Chacon y Calvo (1898-1969)
bioghist.p: José María Chacón y Calvo was a Cuban-born literary critic and academic. He focused on Cuban poetry, befriending and writing about a number of Cuban poets in Cuba and in Spain.

Chacón y Calvo was the subject of several books and articles edited or written by Zenaida Gutiérrez-Vega. Gutiérrez Vega (1924-2007?) was a Cuban-born academic who taught for nearly three decades at Hunter College, CUNY, and whose major subject of study was the life and work of José María Chacón y Calvo.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of material created by or relating to José María Chacón y Calvo, which was accumulated by Zenaida Gutiérrez-Vega in the course of her research on the life and work of the Cuban-born literary critic and academic. Material includes original and copies of correspondence received by Chacón y Calvo from various Cuban, Spanish, and Latin American poets and writers; original manuscripts, typescripts, photocopies, and clippings of writings by Chacón y Calvo; an annotated typescript of Chacón y Calvo's diaries dating from 1917 to 1918; research files containing manuscripts, notes, letters, and printed material relating to other writers (possibly compiled by either Chacón y Calvo or Gutiérrez-Vega); original and photocopies of photographs of Chacón y Calvo; and other material.

Correspondence includes unpublished letters and letters published in Epistolario Alfonso Reyes, José Ma. Chacón (1976), Fernando Ortiz en sus cartas a José Ma. Chacón (1914-1936, 1956) (1982), Corresponsales españoles de José Ma. Chacón (1986), and José María Chacón y Calvo: corresponsales cubanos (2006), all edited by Gutiérrez-Vega.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is organized into three series: I. Photographs, Writings, and Other Papers, circa 1915-1969. II. Correspondence, circa 1910-2007. III. Research Material, 1793-1960s.
This organization is based on how the donor, who was the previous custodian of the collection, had organized the material.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The donor list describes the material in this series as: Fotos dedicadas a Chacón o firmadas; Fotos tomadas por Chacón o de él con otras personas; Ilustraciones para los libros que publicó Zenaida Gutiérrez Vega; Artículos publicados de Chacón; Escritos de Chacón.

did.unittitle: Articles regarding Spanish Literature by Chacón y Calvo
Chacón y Calvo - "Diario en la Muerte de mi Madre"
Chacón y Calvo - Clippings regarding Cuban literature
Chacón y Calvo - Clippings regarding Spanish Literature
Diaries of Chacón y Calvo, annotated typescript

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged into five subseries: Spanish Correspondence, Cuban Correspondence, Unpublished Non-Cuban Correspondence, Unpublished Cuban Correspondence, and Other Correspondence.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The donor list describes this grouping of correspondence as: Files con cartas de los corresponsales españoles, que a continuación se relacionan, y fueron publicadas (excepto las que llevan asterisco*) en el libro Corresponsales españoles de José Ma. Chacón (1986).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The donor list describes this grouping of correspondence as: Files con las cartas de los corresponsales cubanos, que a continuación se relacionan, y fueron publicadas en el libro José María Chacón y Calvo: corresponsales cubanos (2006).

did.unittitle: Torriente y Peraza, Cosme de la

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The donor list describes this grouping of correspondence as: Files con las cartas de corresponsales de otros países que a continuación se relacionan, que NO han sido publicadas.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder includes correspondence from José de la Riva Agüero (Perú), Artemio de Valle-Arizpe (México), Rafael Estrada (Costa Rica), Luis Alberto Sánchez (Perú), Nicolás Rangel (México) and Ventura García Calderón (Perú).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The donor list describes this grouping of correspondence as: Files con las cartas de corresponsales cubanos NO publicadas. El asterisco indica que las cartas y la presentación de los autores están digitalizadas en el Disco Duro (CorresponsalesCubanosNuevos.doc.) y en un Drive que conservo, como para un nuevo libro. El número que sigue a cada autor es el de las páginas que ocupa en lo digitalizado, y sirve para dar una idea de la extensión del material.

did.unittitle: Sánchez de Bustamante y Montoro, Antonio

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The donor list notes the following about this file: no encuentro el diskette con la trascripción de los originales; hay mecanuscrito al que le he hecho un diskette que le copio a su sobrino Jorge Sánchez Galarraga.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The donor list notes the following about this file: Files con cartas no publicadas de Chacón a Agustín Acosta

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The donor list notes the following about this file: Files con las cartas de Fernando Ortiz publicadas en el libro Fernando Ortiz en sus cartas a José Ma. Chacón (1982).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The donor list notes the following about this file: Files con las cartas de Alfonso Reyes, publicadas en el libro Epistolario Alfonso Reyes, José Ma Chacón (1976).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes La Revolucion Cubana y La Raza de Color (Apuntes y Datos) Por Un Cubano Sin Odios (1895).
